name: PyMOL
description: Python-enhanced molecular graphics tool.

name: Jmol
description: Browser-based HTML5 viewer and stand-alone Java viewer for chemical structures in 3D.

name: VMD
description: Molecular visualization program for displaying, animating, and analyzing large biomolecular systems using 3-D graphics and built-in scripting.

name: Chimera
description: Highly extensible program for interactive molecular visualization and analysis.

name: Open Babel
description: Chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data.

name: MayaChemTools
description: Collection of Perl and Python scripts, modules, and classes that support day-to-day computational discovery needs.

name: AutoDock Vina
description: Molecular docking and virtual screening.

name: smina
description: Customized AutoDock Vina to better support scoring function development and high-performance energy minimization.

name: RDKit
description: Collection of cheminformatics and machine-learning software written in C++ and Python.

name: Indigo
description: Universal molecular toolkit that can be used for molecular fingerprinting, substructure search, and molecular visualization written in C++ package, with Java, C#, and Python wrappers.

name: CDK (Chemistry Development Kit)
description: Algorithms for structural chemo- and bioinformatics, implemented in Java.

name: ChemmineR
description: Cheminformatics package for analyzing drug-like small molecule data in R.

name: standardiser
description: Tool designed to provide a simple way of standardising molecules as a prelude to e.g. molecular modelling exercises.

name: MolVS
description: Molecule validation and standardization based on RDKit.

name: Kekule.js
description: Front-end JavaScript library for providing the ability to represent, draw, edit, compare and search molecule structures on web browsers.

name: JChemPaint
description: Chemical 2D structure editor application/applet based on the Chemistry Development Kit.

name: rdeditor
description: Simple RDKit molecule editor GUI using PySide.

name: mordred
description: Molecular descriptor calculator based on RDKit.

name: mol2vec
description: Vector representations of molecular substructures.

name: Align-it
description: Align molecules according their pharmacophores.

name: DeepChem
description: Democratizing deep learning for Chemistry.

name: webchem
description: Chemical Information from the Web.

name: PubChemPy
description: Python wrapper for the PubChem PUG REST API.

name: ChemSpiPy
description: Python wrapper for the ChemSpider API.

name: CIRpy
description: Python wrapper for the NCI Chemical Identifier Resolver (CIR).

name: Beaker
description: RDKit and OSRA in the Bottle on Tornado.

name: razi
description: Cheminformatic extension for the SQLAlchemy database.

name: Gromacs
description: Molecular dynamics package mainly designed for simulations of proteins, lipids and nucleic acids.

name: OpenMM
description: High performance toolkit for molecular simulation including extensive language bindings for Python, C, C++, and even Fortran.

name: MDTraj
description: Analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories.

name: cclib
description: Parsers and algorithms for computational chemistry logfiles.
